p: A number of medical trials have investigated the effective use of some EOs in treating methicillin-resistant S. aureus (MRSA) in vitro, for example, Lippia origanoides Kunth, Backhousia citriodora F. Muell, M. piperita, M. arvensis, M. spicata, and Melaleuca alternifolia (Maiden & Betche) Cheel [ 17]. Further studies reported the effective use of EO extracted from Citrus aurantium var. amara L. in inhibiting Tinea corporis disease even at low concentrations.
